name: @political-sphere/api-openapi
description: OpenAPI specifications and tooling for Political Sphere API

scripts.validate: npm run validate:spec && npm run validate:lint
scripts.generate: npm run generate:client && npm run generate:server && npm run generate:docs
scripts.generate:client: npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i api.yaml -g typescript-axios -o generated/client --config openapi-generator-config.json
scripts.generate:server: npx @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i api.yaml -g typescript-node -o generated/server --config openapi-generator-config.json
scripts.test:examples: npx @apidevtools/swagger-parser validate api.yaml --resolve && echo 'All examples validated'
